channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI chipmaker Broadcom shares soar 17% despite mixed quarterly results — here's why
item.description: We're increasing our price target on the stock after a slew of positive AI updates.

item.title: After Another Bad Year for Bonds, Investors Lose Faith in a Turnaround
item.description: Many worry that a tough environment for bonds could get even worse.

item.title: Micron shares plunge on weak second-quarter guidance
item.description: Micron shares plunged in extended trading after the chipmaker issued weaker-than-expected second-quarter guidance.

item.title: A Thrill-Seeking Trade Amps Up Heading Into 2025
item.description: Stock options are soaring with everyday investors wagering on market whipsaws.

item.title: Money Can Buy a Longer Life---to a Point
item.description: Saving makes your nest egg last longer. Spending might make you last longer.

item.title: Wall Street Expects Gold to Glitter Again in 2025
item.description: Big banks are forecasting that prices will rise to $3,000 in the year ahead.

item.title: Nike CEO Elliott Hill outlines new strategy after retailer blames promotions for declining revenue and profit
item.description: Nike beat Wall Street's expectations on the top and bottom lines under new CEO Elliott Hill.

item.title: Costco quarter signals record stock run is not done yet. Here's our new price target
item.description: With gross margins and paid memberships trending higher, this rally to fresh highs can continue.

item.title: Darden Restaurants stock climbs as Olive Garden, LongHorn Steakhouse fuel sales growth
item.description: Darden Restaurants met Wall Street's expectations for its fiscal second-quarter results.

item.title: He Lost 35% Ignoring 2024's Biggest Trades: 'I Am Not Good at What I Am Doing'
item.description: Hedge-fund manager Richard Toh’s raw mea culpa details how he ignored Nvidia and bitcoin and misread tariffs.
